website_summaries.verdict: Taking a bold step into the PC market, the Vizio Thin+Light CT14 is a fresh take on the 14-inch ultrabook, held back by some first-gen jitters.
pros: The Vizio Thin+Light CT14 has an excellent consumer-electronics-inspired design, and is enviably thin and light
Its clutter-free desktop and minimalist looks showcase the fact that this is not just another rote laptop
cons: The CT14 is plagued by head-scratching omissions -- from a backlit keyboard to a SD card slot -- that make this feel like a first-gen product
The touch pad and battery life are also disappointing

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work and it was tempered.!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop just bcs of its unique look and design but couldnt find one with new condition so i ended up buying it used... But the laptop arrived “tempered” and it looked like somebody either opened it up or damaged the bottom of the laptop... I was still gonna be okay with it at some point but the laptop didnt turn on and got stuck at the Vizio logo. I had to return it and lost time and effort during the process. They need to check and be sure before selling something online..especially when its used.!
customer_reviews.author: BooRocK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mouse and keyboard ruin a good computer
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -great build quality (very thin and light, as advertised) -nice screen -decent performance for the money (I bought this for $480 so it may have changed price) Cons: -Keyboard and trackpad are terrible (mouse can barely right click and sometimes doesn't work at all, keys sometimes double strike). This alone is so bad it takes my review down from 5 to 2 stars. I'll update this review if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: frequent flyer

customer_reviews.title: Save up for something better if you can.
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad is not very smooth, even with the software update. The battery dies quickly, normally lasting about 2 hours or less on a full charge. The pointer freezes randomly. It shuts down (kernel panic) with 20% battery left. The speaker is loud, it is light, sleek and thin. It boots up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October 2012, in March 2013 the hard drive failed. It was still under warranty. They fixed it up and returned it very quickly. Great service! As I understand these ssd hard drives fail often and suddenly. So do back up your computer. Not thrilled with Windows 8 which is not Vizio's fault. The ssd hard drive makes it very fast. I use an external 3.0 with a Seagate Momentus hard drive. This too is very fast. This is such an attractive computer and very light. The service from Vizio was excellent and fast, they also sent out a box prepaid for the return. Would definitely buy a Vizio again.
customer_reviews.author: L. G OHara

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Vizio notebook and are very happy with it. The company is looking for a niche and is doing very well at this. The product just arrived and it took me minutes before I was up and running. We got this for our son in college. No bloatware just the stuff you need to get going. Everything works great out of the box. Boots very quickly and is a pleasure to look at. MS Signature really helps because no need to install and pay for an additional antivirus. Love the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: redsox09

customer_reviews.title: Overall Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good job for the first line of laptops from Vizio. Positives: -extremely lightweight, can be carried anywhere with ease -HD display, everthing looks quite nice -low profile keyboard, makes typing effortless -powerful ultrabook for being at lower end of line Negatives: -first and foremost; the trackpad, it sticks it lags and sometimes it freezes, not nearly as smooth as a Mac, kind of gritty mking it difficult to use fingers if even mildy moist (sweat) -no backlit keys, difficult to see what you are typing in the dark, even moreso because of the low profile keys All in all I am satisfied with this laptop, the negatives are minimal and one can deal. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ajb

customer_reviews.title: vizio ultra book
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fine computer....and I got an especially fine price thru Amazon! It is lightweight, boots up quickly, has a long battery life and the screen resolution is better than hi-def! It's very easy on my eyes-I find that I can use the computer with ease for a much longer period of time. There is no fan noise, which was an annoyance with my other computer.This is the perfect computer! Vizio needs to upgrade their marketing...this is comparable to the other brands that sell for double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diana McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: This thing had so many driver issues out the box. Keyboard keys would stop working, track pack would stop working. Peripheral mouse devices would stop working I had to do so many driver/system updates to make it semi-functional.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard and touchpad detract from an amazing device
customer_reviews.text: Almost unusable compared to a Macbook Pro that I also own. I like to try different devices and this touchpad is very hard to point with, to the point that I will in general not spend more than a few minutes using this. Even typing is a challenge for me since I type very fast on a number of keyboards, and cannot have the same success with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Fast boot up and very nice screen
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this computer by the price and nicer screen than many competitors. It was also important to get a computer that booted up quickly. I am pleased. The touch keys work fine and I had no major problems otherwise. It will be used as " a second car" not as my primary work computer. For that type of use ,the weight and boot up time make this at a price of $600 a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: ridgepath

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful thin laptop (like macbook air) except cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Freaking awesome laptop that I'm sad I didn't buy multiples of... The only problem I've had with mine is flakey wirless, which I simply solved by sliding in a micro USB wifi wireless N adapter. Annoying the wifi doesn't work well for me, however with the USB device it's solid and it only cost $10 to fix.
customer_reviews.author: MrZii

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot type fast because sometimes the keyboard gets stuck and repeats the same key a few times. Internet connection is poor. You need to be close to the wifi modem or otherwise it will not work. Computer sometimes gets stuck and needs a hard reboot. Save your money and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Yaron

customer_reviews.title: It is made to last thank you VIZIO
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it arrived guickly and was packaged well. Ive seen hp for new same price not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Bright

customer_reviews.title: Met High Expectations
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews I knew there were going to be some annoyances with the trackpad, but they were few compared to the many great things about this laptop. The hardware is fantastic and beautiful, I've had several people ask what kind of laptop is was and were blown away when I said Vizio. I recently upgraded to Windows 8, and the laptop became even more amazing. I have recommended this laptop to several friends who are looking for something new and light.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schlitter

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with purchase of this laptop. I had a problem with the first one so I returned and reordered only to have the same problem.the charger continuously blinked and after several hours unplugged and laptop went dead. Will no reorder again.
customer_reviews.author: karen dziubina

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop except for the sharp edges, which cut into your arm while using the keyboard. My husband filed the edges and now it's just fine. The keyboard requires a hard touch and the touchpad is ultra touchy which is a problem when using the keyboard and your hand brushes the touchpad while typing. I had to disable the touchpad. For the price, this isn't what I bargained for.
customer_reviews.author: MJT

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item 2 weeks ago and since day ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 2 weeks ago and since day 1 I saw that the charger enables me to turn on and use the laptop, but it isn't charging the battery. It is important not be fooled by the price tag of this product. It may end up costing you much more that what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great computer; Bad trackpad and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is great, amazing display... But there are some real problems with the mouse trackpad and the keyboard... I find myself constantly annoyed with the horrible sensitivity of the pad and unlike my past laptops, i really have to hit the keys hard for them to register.. typing in class is loud and obnoxious... if your in the market for the laptop.. would really suggest going to a computer store and feeling the keyboard and trackpad first.. if i had.. i think i would have went for a different ultrabook.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love my new computer
customer_reviews.text: My new computer is great came with windows 7 but we received the upgrade for windows 8. It is amazingly fast and from start up and from sleep resumes all most instantly. It's insane to think anything could be any faster.
customer_reviews.author: Bondfu

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard and mouse pad bring this good platform down
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard and mouse pad bring this good platform down. Keyboard double and triple strikes all the time and the mouse pad is just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DonH2OSurfer

customer_reviews.title: . It crashes frequently.
customer_reviews.text: you get the blue screen of death. It crashes frequently even though it runs windows 7 the one Microsoft finally got right after 25 years.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: You will get 2. 5 hours out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: You will get 2.5 hours out of this thing tops during active use. Don't know where they got 7hours from.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I have bought. Light weight. Very long battery. Fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite laptop ever! They have battery issues but other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Hard Disc Dead, no data recovery possible!
customer_reviews.text: I used to loved it! Its light, elegant, thin.. except for the mouse pad, it was a really good buy. All of a sudden, out of nothing, the Hard Disc Drives goes dead. I mean DEAD. Not even able to recover any info out of it. This makes every possible PRO it has seem a little too unimportant. Never had a computer that dies 7 months after buying. Gives you too much to think about VIZIO quality! What a Shame! Careful on your next buy and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: igalca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent display, finicky power connector
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, SSD, attractive 1600x900 IPS screen. I am pleased that there is no pre-installed trial-ware. The only issue was a poorly fitting power jack, I found that I have to rotate the power jack in its socket just so before it will charge. A bit plastic-y and no SD card reader but happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: paul maenner

customer_reviews.title: Everything good except the most important stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this laptop but the thing that I really hate is the touchpad, its the worst Ive ever used. I downloaded the updated driver and I see no difference, the keyboard at times registers a keystroke twice. The screen is super nice just like everything else, but the touchpad really is making me want to sell this thing and buy another laptop that has an actual working touchpad. And the battery life kinda sucks to
customer_reviews.author: Cecy

customer_reviews.title: vizio laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vizio laptop,seller ships quick and items was in immaculate condition....apart from that the laptop is slightly thicker and longer than a mac book air when compared side by side although by itself one can hardly notice the difference.I recommend getting it refurbished as the full price is a bit steep for whats on offer.
customer_reviews.author: taffycolours

customer_reviews.title: Still a great Laptop, after 4yrs use
customer_reviews.text: Still a great Laptop, after 4yrs use. Long battery life. No noise/heat. No issues... Only wish I had on more USB port since one is occupied by wireless mouse.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only downside with this computer has been that the touchpad is a little sensitive. Other than that I love it. The Microsoft signature operating system is great because it doesn't have all the unnecessary software. It starts up faster than my buddies mac book air as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ward Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Thin One
customer_reviews.text: Found the VIZIO Thin and Light CT14-AO 14-Inch Ultrabook to be everything as described.The size and weight are perfect for me. The operating system and display leave nothing to desire.Would recommend for anyone wanting a small lightweight with all the power you should need.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Had it less than 9 months, overheats and has started crashing lately
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at the beginning, but slowly it has begun to deteriorate. It overheats significantly, like hot to touch overheating. It also has recently begun to freeze for no reason. There are maybe 200 documents on it, tops.
customer_reviews.author: M Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I'm just going off to college, and I got this laptop. It's absolutely amazing!! Only a few issues occur every now and again, mostly with the mouse, but I'm sure with a few driver updates, it'll be fine. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Malec

customer_reviews.title: Good computer, thin and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Vizio is a new brand for me, so I give it the chance and so far so good! No problems to configure it, little difficulty to remove the bing toolbar and searcher.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Cobos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Ultrabook is everything I expected and more, so light,very fuctional, can take any and everywhere very easily. Thanks you so much, Sherry Denise Wardlow
customer_reviews.author: sherry denise wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, great service. Very think and light, and a great screen. The keys work great and the pad is not as bad as most suggest. Steve
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good One!!
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. Looks beautiful, is light. Only negative point is the trackpad which isn't great. It was worse initially, then i applied an update by Visio and it got better.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Best pc I have ever used. Its so extra fast and has very good display. Its the cheapest ultrabook that I found (600).
customer_reviews.author: David Watkin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for this cost. Best display resolution. Very ergonomic and thin. But LAN port does not exist, so 4.0 my rating.
customer_reviews.author: NOM

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I love the clear, bright display and the high resolution as someone said.i think it is a great little laptop!!!
customer_reviews.author: pengfei li

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: In truth has its problems, the tocuhpad the most serious yet hardly use, the keyboard lacks some features but is customary. The screen is very clear and bright magnified, and a great resolution, great for work, start very fast, your ssd drive is fast although not the best, the 128GB will remain somewhat scarce. For the price at which the purchase ($ 379), was the best buy, new me it would think twice
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Ruales

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: It is impressive Vizio produced such a sound laptop. It works fantastically but the mouse pad can be a bit touchy.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Knottnerus

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Computer
customer_reviews.text: Love the computer, but the touchpad is not user friendly. I wish I knew how to use it the proper way.
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Very fast and nice.., its totally worth it and i have no regret buying it...its the best laptop
customer_reviews.author: Nisa

customer_reviews.title: Vizio should make TV and TV only, its computer sucks
customer_reviews.text: yes, it is light and thin, BUT the mouse touchpad broke down less than 18 months after I purchased it, and had to buy a separate mouse. And blue creens happen on a frequent base. THE most regretable purchase I have ever made on Amazon. Definitely avoid Vizio if you want to play it safe with your work. With the same amount of money you can get a decent model from Dell or HP, and add a few bucks you can get a mac...
customer_reviews.author: balabala

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery
customer_reviews.text: Bad battery, company said there was nothing they could do.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Earle

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: could not see the key board very well since it was the same color as the rest of the bottom part. I am still waiting for my full return on my money s or some reason dealit is hold back $241.00 of my money for no reason. Restocking should not cost that much and just because I did not like the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Retjos

customer_reviews.title: The trackpad is not good. But I carry a mouse and keyboard with ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard has huge issues. The trackpad is not good. But I carry a mouse and keyboard with me everywhere so it doesn't bother me. Otherwise this was an excellent computer. Great hardware, very thin and light, and a competitive price. I've been using it for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Evan L.

customer_reviews.title: I could not charge the computer. I can only ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not charge the computer. I can only use it with power cord connected. Finally I returned the computer and retunr my payment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: acquired model Visio tst14 a0, pleased with everything - great computer behaves very shustro.good build quality. IPS matrix. screen resolution of 1600x900 and low price. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expectation was a little becuz it was refurbished instead a new. But I Loveeeee it. So sleek and think. Fast delivery as well! Only thing that's alittle disappointing is the traftpad.. other than that thw computer is perd
customer_reviews.author: Gavaun Dean

customer_reviews.title: ok this thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: so I have never written a review after 6 years as a prime member and spending way too much money here. But this little guy deserves all the kudos it can get. the display is amazing the performance is exceptional and this thing is dam sexy... way to go Vizio.... keep it up
customer_reviews.author: John Radgowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop, but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Vizio because it was highly recommmended by Cosumer Reports. The number one reason that I went with Vizio over HP, Dell, etc was because of the great, high quality screen that the Vizio has. That being said, after only having the PC for several months, I've noticed that a pixel towards the middle of the screen has gone out. Now I'm out side of Amazon's return window and I need to contact Vizio to replace the screen because one pixel has died. What a waste of my time and $!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TravisinOrlando

customer_reviews.title: it is not movable device!
customer_reviews.text: For what purpose people buy laptop? - To use them on the way. I bought mine in US and took abroad with me. At this time it stopped to work. I contacted vizio support and they refused to help me with my problem because I was not in US those time! Silly behaviour with crazy rules in vizio. 2 years ago I got the similar problem with Samsung - they helped me the same time when I asked them.
customer_reviews.author: Righter

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I never even opened the box because I decided on another Laptop that I am very happy with. I refused it and sent it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O. Oberkrom

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Vizio
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that they are just getting into the computer business. They should stick to TVs. My motherboard went out after 14 months and their replacement price for just the board is $627, $28 more than I paid for the computer originally. No wonder they were on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McCarthy

product_meta.title: Vizio CT14-A0 14-Inch Thin Light Ultrabook Laptop PC (1.80GHz Intel Core i3-3217U Processor, 4GB RAM 128GB SSD Windows 7 Home Premium) Silver
product_meta.description:
With uncompromising performance, and premium picture and audio quality in a remarkably thin profile, the VIZIO Thin + Light is the Ultrabook™ that’s impossible to ignore. But don’t let its thin profile fool you - it outperforms notebooks twice its size. The high-performance 14" models sport a Full HD or HD+ display and premium SRS sound for the best entertainment experience. Powered by the latest Intel Core processors, the VIZIO Thin + Light uses instant-on, flash-based SSD drives for speedy boot-ups and includes Microsoft Signature for fast performance right out of the box. If good things come in small packages, this must be the best there is.

AMAZON.COM

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars125 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
